                           DESCRiPTiON N&#039; iNSTALLATiON                    

        ArtRage 2.0 is a fun and easy to use painting tool for Windows
      that lets you play with realistic paints on your computer. You can
          create your own paintings from nothing, load in photos and
       recreate them with oil paints, pencils, felt pens, or any of the
      other tools ArtRage has to offer. You can experiment with metallic
        paint for gold leafing, sprinkle shiny glitter, fill in large
        areas with the paint roller, and generally paint, smudge, and
      smear your way to your very own masterpiece.
